attributes.additional_details:
Keep the main Bus Stops in Market Square, Bicester.  and just have stops outside sainsbury's if people want to get off their then they still can. It feels safer in Market Square than outside Sainsbury' s on Manorsfield Road.
I now feel I can not use the buses as it does not feel safe where they are now located it worked better in Market Square plus easy access to shops on Market Square. It will get worse when nights draw in. Please help me by signing this petition.

rejection.details: This is an issue for the local council and the creator may wish to petition the council on this issue.
